interaction_summary:

Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 5.12 x 1.14 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DSF-BS-LAV'}
Review Text: This deodorant goes on smooth. It has a full lavender scent. It's deodorant qualities are good.  the product controls odors all day. I find it non irritating and happy it doesn't have aluminum in it.

reference_summary:
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'} I love that the toner is in a spray bottle. I wish the instructions were in A bit more clear. I do not know if you are supposed to spray it on your face and go or use a cotton pad. I do not feel a tightening on my skin like most toners. It leaves my skin soft and it smells wonderful! I have just been spraying it on my face after washing and I like that it’s easier, quicker and less waste when you don’t need a cotton pad. Quick, easy to apply -wonderful smelling toner! SENGOLOGY Water Flosser Professional Countertop Flosser Dental Oral Irrigator -Rechargeable 12 Modes Water Flossing with Cleanable Water Tank for Home, Braces & Bridges Care SENSOLOGY {'Brand': 'SENSOLOGY', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Multiple Operation Modes', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '700 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 6.57 x 5.08 inches; 1.96 Pounds', 'UPC': '850004585177', 'Manufacturer': 'SENSOLOGY'} This is a good water flosser . I’m comparing it to others I have owned. The last one I had did not last long- this appears to be better made and it just looks nicer overall. The water well holds a fair amount of water however I would like it to hold a bit more. It has many levels of power for the water to spray out. The low is very weak and the high is pretty darn strong and could be painful if you aren’t careful. There are plenty of adjustments in between so you will find one that suits your mouth just right. It also has a “massage “ button which basically cuts down the strength of the jet and makes it pulse to massage your gums. I find it a bit too soft of my gums , even on the highest level. This product does a great job in cleaning between your teeth and below gum line. I hate to floss so this is a great option to keep my teeth clean and well cared for. If your house is Not new and only has one plug in your bathroom, you will appreciate the long cords- both the electrical and the water hose. One thing I like about this water flosser is that it does NOT leak like my other one did. This keeps my counter neat. This is a good product to add to your daily dental hygiene regimen . It is easy and does a great job cleaning .
* If you found this review helpful please click the button below to let Amazon know. Thanks ! Better than flossing or brushing alone! JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof JDO {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I was not impressed with this when I first received it. The package looked old and faded. However when I opened it and used the eyelash curler I was very impressed. The curler worked quickly and easily , it was comfortable and easy to use- my lashes curled well with one squeeze. It comes with two extra pads for the curler. The mascara wand is small and is able to get every lash. I was told the mascara makes my lashes look very natural- of clumpy. The mascara really lengthened my lashes. Long, curled lashes- very natural. Face Lift Tapes for Instant Face, Neck and Eye Lift Kit Tape C CRYSTAL LEMON {'Brand': 'C CRYSTAL LEMON', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.35 x 0.87 inches; 0.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '725330346603'} I tried these strips and they did not stick well, they popped off so I REALLY my face and put toner on and they still popped off. Not a big fan of this product. Not great Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant - No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Solid Deodorant Featuring Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Lavender) PRETTY FRANK {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 5.12 x 1.14 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DSF-BS-LAV'} This deodorant goes on smooth. It has a full lavender scent. It's deodorant qualities are good. the product controls odors all day. I find it non irritating and happy it doesn't have aluminum in it. Pleasant scent
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to prioritize skincare and personal care products that are user-friendly and effective, with a recent focus on natural options. They appreciate skincare products like toners that facilitate easy application and enhance their routine. The user's interest has expanded to include deodorants, demonstrating a commitment to overall personal care with an emphasis on natural ingredients.

- **Application Method:** Preferring spray formats for skincare products, the user also enjoys smooth application methods, as evidenced by their recent deodorant purchase. They seek quick and efficient usage without needing additional tools, though they have experienced some dissatisfaction with recent beauty tools, highlighting a desire for dependable performance.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user values pleasant scents in products, favoring enjoyable fragrances that elevate their routine. Recent interactions indicate a preference for natural scents, such as lavender and coconut, enhancing their overall sensory experience.

- **Skin Feel and Efficacy:** The user appreciates products that soften the skin and control odors effectively, while remaining open to varied outcomes. Concerns about product efficacy have been noted, indicating a need for reliable results.

- **Desire for Clarity and Ease of Use:** The user values clear instructions on product usage and favors simple application methods, ensuring a straightforward and efficient experience across all personal care routines. Their commitment to convenience continues to guide their product selections.
